heading: HR00291
0: A RESOLUTION RESTORING THE HOUSE RULES OF THE 14TH CONGRESS ON THE MATTER OF EXPLANATION OF VOTE ON NOMINAL VOTING, THEREBY ALLOWING A MEMBER TO EXPLAIN HIS/HER VOTE FOR NOT MORE THAN THREE (3) MINUTES DURING NOMINAL VOTING

FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION RESTORING THE HOUSE RULES OF THE 14TH CONGRESS ON THE MATTER OF EXPLANATION OF VOTE ON NOMINAL VOTING, THEREBY ALLOWING A MEMBER TO EXPLAIN HIS/HER VOTE FOR NOT MORE THAN THREE (3) MINUTES DURING NOMINAL VOTING
